gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 107, Nuggets 105
gameRecap.excerpt: Kyrie gets the tough game-winning floater to drop for Dallas to defeat Denver, 107-105. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way with 37 points, nine rebounds, and two steals while Kyrie Irving finished with 24 points, seven rebounds, nine assists, and three steals in the victory. Jamal Murray recorded with 23 points, four rebounds, and seven assists while aided by Michael Porter Jr. (20 points, seven rebounds, two steals, two blocks) and Nikola Jokic (16 points, 11 rebounds, seven assists, two steals) for Denver in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 39-29, while Denver moves to 47-21 in the loss.
